name: Rocket Away
overview: We tossed a rocket into the deep voids of space. However, the rocket has lost control and is heading towards and asteroid belt. Your task is to simply guide the rocket around the screen and avoid getting smashed by the asteroids. Your Rocket is controlled by an automatic system. It will speed up the rocket each level and peak at level 8. Good luck. Published in The C64 'Cassette 50' Charity Competition tape.
